  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnActionModeFinishedListener, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnActionModeStartedListener, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnCreatePanelMenuListener, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnMenuItemSelectedListener, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnPreparePanelListener

    public class LoginActivity
extends com.actionbarsherlock.app.SherlockActivity
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener
    This class holds the LoginActivity which offers the possibility to validate the entered email and password, and load userdata which are needed for the application to function.
    Author:
    Dimitri Mantler

    • Method Detail

      • alertDialog

        public void alertDialog()
        This method displays an AlertDialog with terms & conditions and gives the user a choice between accepting them or not. Accepting will call the startApp-method.

      • onClick

        public void onClick(android.view.View v)
        This method will be triggered by clicking a button. login-button: triggers the validation-process. register-button: starts an intent to be used by a browser.
        Specified by:
        onClick in interface android.view.View.OnClickListener

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        This method will be automatically called in the Activity-lifecycle and initializes the GUI. Also the preferences will be set und the current context will be saved for later use .
        Overrides:
        onCreate in class android.app.Activity

      • onCreateOptionsMenu

        public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(com.actionbarsherlock.view.Menu menu)
        This method will be automatically called in the Activity-lifecycle and adds a clickable menuitem to the actionbar.
        Overrides:
        onCreateOptionsMenu in class com.actionbarsherlock.app.SherlockActivity

      • onOptionsItemSelected

        public boolean onOptionsItemSelected(com.actionbarsherlock.view.MenuItem item)
        This method will be automatically called if a clickevent is registered on one of the items inside the actionbar. settings: starts PreferenceActivity
        Overrides:
        onOptionsItemSelected in class com.actionbarsherlock.app.SherlockActivity

      • startApp

        public void startApp()
        This method saves the current userdata to the local sqlite-database and starts the MainMenuActivity.

      • validateLogin

        public boolean validateLogin()
        This method validates the login-credentials and requests the unique session-ID. If the session is valid, indicated by a value greater than -1, the corresponding userdata will be loaded.
        Returns:
        true if login-credentials are valid, else false
